items.name: Anis B.
items.testimonial:
Before we started using SynAI’s voice agent, we were easily missing 15–20 calls a day, especially during lunch and dinner service. That meant dozens of potential customers lost each week and growing frustration for our clientele.

Since implementing SynAI, we’ve cut missed calls by 36 % and seen a 19 % increase in phone reservations in under two months. The agent automatically answers common questions and books tables directly in our OpenTable system.

Most impressive: everything was set up and running in less than two weeks, and we didn’t have to change our phone number. Customers hardly noticed—except their wait times dropped and they get better information.

I recommend this solution 100 % to any restaurateur who can’t afford a full-time receptionist. It’s like hiring an ultra-reliable employee for a third of the cost.

items.name: Véronique B.
items.testimonial:
We first deployed SynAI’s Voice Agent in a highly targeted way—only during closing hours, from 10 p.m. to 7 a.m.—to serve callers from other time zones, especially our U.S. guests. In less than a month, the agent handled over 31 % of overnight calls and achieved a 93 % customer-satisfaction rating (based on our post-interaction survey).

The most common inquiries were about room availability, cancellation policies, and parking options—simple yet time-consuming questions.

Impressed by the results, we moved to phase 2: a full 24/7 rollout. Since then, our front-desk team spends 38 % less time on the phone and can focus on in-person check-ins and arrivals.

Our average occupancy rate rose from 72 % to 78 % in just three months, largely thanks to the agent’s ability to capture bookings that used to slip through after hours.

The SynAI team guided us through every step; I wholeheartedly recommend their service.

items.name: Michael J.
items.testimonial:
Before partnering with SynAI, our receptionist was fielding 80–100 calls a day, and patients often reached voicemail—especially around lunchtime or late in the afternoon.

We brought in SynAI’s voice agent to take over whenever the line is busy or outside office hours. In under two months, missed appointments (no-shows) dropped by 22 %, largely thanks to automated reminders. Our receptionists now handle fewer calls overall, but each one is more meaningful, because routine questions are resolved automatically.

The real game-changer was SynAI’s hands-on support. They invested time to learn our workflows, terminology, and patient needs. Together we built a tailored knowledge base—covering insurance, treatments, appointment policies—and everything went live quickly.

Today, our staff feels less pressure, and patients get better service no matter when they call. SynAI is more than just technology for us; it’s a genuine partner in our commitment to quality care.

items.question: How long does it take to deploy a voice agent?
items.answer: Most clients are operational within one to two weeks thanks to our pre‑configured templates and guided onboarding.

items.question: Can the voice agent integrate with our CRM or reservation system?
items.answer: Absolutely. Our voice agent is API‑first and integrates with popular tools such as OpenTable, Libro and others. We handle the integration with you so everything runs smoothly with zero friction.

items.question: How much does the voice agent cost?
items.answer:
Notre tarification est simple et transparente :

Frais d’implantation : un montant fixe pour la mise en place, qui peut aussi être inclus dans un forfait mensuel si vous préférez étaler le coût.

Abonnement mensuel : il comprend le support, les mises à jour, et 2000 minutes d’utilisation incluses.

Au-delà de 2000 minutes : 0,20 $ par minute supplémentaire.

Add-ons optionnels (ex. : intégration CRM, statistiques avancées, synchronisation sur mesure…) : des frais mensuels s’appliquent selon les modules choisis.

Notre objectif est de vous offrir un service flexible, adapté à vos besoins réels, sans surprises.

items.question: Is our data secure?
items.answer:
Data security and privacy are central to our approach:

Europe: full compliance with the GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation)

Canada: adherence to Law 25 and PIPEDA requirements

United States: infrastructure compatible with HIPAA and CCPA standards as needed

All communications are end-to-end encrypted, and we also offer on-premises or dedicated-cloud deployment options for organizations with strict requirements (e.g., public sector, healthcare, finance).

items.question: Which languages do you support?
items.answer: Our voice agent currently supports more than 30 languages, and we add new ones every quarter.

items.question: Can I try the voice agent before committing?
items.answer: Book a demo with our team—we can set up a tailored proof of concept free of charge.
